page.title: 10TRADE - SHOP PRICES
page.content: HELLO - MY NAME IS ANDREA. EVERY THURSDAY MY MUM GOES TO 'KWIK SAVE' FOR OUR WEEKLY SHOPPING. USUALLY SHE SPENDS AROUND Â£30 ON THE BASIC ITEMS.HERE IS A LIST OF SOME OF THE THINGS SHE BUYS AND THEIR PRICES. BREAD 38p,BUTTER 49p,JAR OF JAM 35p, BAG OF SUGAR 42p, ONE POUND FRESH BACON Â£1.35, A 'SIX' BAG OF CRISPS 52p, CEREAL 'FROSTIES' 72p, 5 POUNDS OF POTATOES 23p AND ONE SMALL JAR OF COFFEE Â£1.28.' KWIK SAVE' LIKE MANY OTHER SUPERMARKETS, HAS A VARIETY OF DIFFERENT GOODS SUCH AS SHAMPOO, SOAP, TALCUM POWDER AND TOOTHPASTE. THEY ALSO HAVE A GOOD VARIETY OF CLEANERS LIKE 'AJAX', 'PLEDGE', AND 'MR SHEEN' WHICH WE USE FOR CLEANING AROUND THE HOUSE. I ALWAYS ENJOY SHOPPING VERY MUCH, ALTHOUGH IT DOES SEEM TO COST MORE TO BUY GOODS, EVERY TIME WE GO.
